head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MONSANTO, ANNA MARIA

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MONSANTO, ANNA MARIA

block.p: MONSANTO--Anna Maria, on January 19th, 2007. Beloved wife of the late Enrique. Loving mother of Enrique, Anna Maria, and Yvette. Cherished grandmother of Gabriela, and Michael. In repose at the Fairchild Sons Funeral Chapel, 1570 Northern Boulevard, Manhasset, New York on Sunday, 3-5 and 7-9pm. Graveside service, Monday at Calverton National Cemetery. Donations may be made to: Gurwin Jewish Geriatric Foundation, 68 Hauppauge Road, PO Box 9017, Commack New York, 11725.
